ContentSnippet.Name: CSS - Home Page
ContentSnippet.ContentSnippet:
<style>
.galleries {
	margin-top: 30px;
	width: 190px;
	float: right;
}
.galleries hr {
	color: #111;
}
.gallery-list {
	padding: 0;
	margin-right: 0;
}
.gallery-list li {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    list-style-type: none;
    background-color: #eee;
    height: 72px;
    margin-bottom: 8px;
    font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 12px;
    padding-right: 8px;
}
.gallery-list li:hover {
	display: block;
	background-color: #ccc;
}
.gallery-list li p {
    font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
    font-size: 11px;
    color: #111;
    display: block;
    padding: 10px 0;
}
.gallery-list li img {
    float: left;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    margin-right: 10px;
}
.gallery-list li span {
	display: block;
	position: absolute;
	height: 100%;
	width: 100%;
	top: 0;
	left: 0;
	z-index: 1;
}
/* Sidebar subheadings */
div.subheading-wrap {
	text-align: center;
	height: 25px;
	margin: 0;
	position: relative;
}
h2.gallery-subheading {
	color: #5f5f5f;
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: normal;
	font-size: 14px;
	font-family: Georgia, Times, serif;
	line-height: 16px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	padding: 0 8px;
	height: 14px;
	display: inline-block;
	background-color: #fff;
}
div.horizontal-line {
	position: absolute;
	top: 0;
	width: 100%;
	height: 45%;
	border-bottom: 1px solid #7c7c7c;
	overflow: hidden;
	z-index: -1;
}
div.vertical-line {
	width: 1px;
	height: 8px;
	margin: 0 -4px 0 -4px;
	background-color: #000;
	display: inline-block;
}
</style>
